definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sweep or whirl away (of storm-wind) (= [[סָעַר]], q.v.; As. šâru, wind, D1:HWB 635; >Thes:1334 cp. I. [[שׂער]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִשְׂעָרֶנּוּ]] Ps 58:10 fig. he (´[[י]]:) shall sweep it away.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. impers. [[נִשְׂעֲרָה]] Ps 50:3 round about him it is tempestuous exceedingly.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וִישַׂעֲרֵ֫הוּ]] Job 27:21 and it [an E. wind] shall whirl him away fr. ([[מִן]]) his place.

definitions.title: Hitph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וְיִשְׂתָּעֵר]] [[עָלָיו]] Da 11:40 the kg. shall storm against him.
